readMode.ariaLabel: select which reading mode to use

autoRead.ariaLabel: each page will be read to the user in the voice of their choosing

pageRead.ariaLabel: each page will be read to the user in the voice of their choosing, but the user is responsible for changing the page

selfRead.ariaLabel: the user will read each page

selectedReaderImage.ariaLabel: select the voice to read the book
